talentList.name: Improved Poisons
talentList.description: Increases the chance to apply Deadly Poison to your target by v0% and the frequency of applying Instant Poison to your target by v1%.

talentList.name: Lethality
talentList.description: Increases the critical strike damage bonus of all combo point-generating abilities that do not require stealth by v0%.

talentList.name: Malice
talentList.description: Increases your critical strike chance by v0%.

talentList.name: Remorseless Attacks
talentList.description: After killing an opponent that yields experience or honor, gives you a v0% increased critical strike chance on your next Sinister Strike, Hemorrhage, Backstab, Mutilate, Ambush, or Ghostly Strike.  Lasts 20 sec.

talentList.name: Ruthlessness
talentList.description: Gives your melee finishing moves a v0% chance to add a combo point to your target.

talentList.name: Murder
talentList.description: Increases all damage caused by v0%.

talentList.name: Improved Eviscerate
talentList.description: Increases the damage done by your Eviscerate ability by v0%.

talentList.name: Puncturing Wounds
talentList.description: Increases the critical strike chance of your Backstab ability by v0%, and the critical strike chance of your Mutilate ability by v1%.

talentList.name: Improved Expose Armor
talentList.description: Reduces the energy cost of your Expose Armor ability by v0.

talentList.name: Improved Kidney Shot
talentList.description: While affected by your Kidney Shot ability, the target receives an additional v0% damage from all sources.

talentList.name: Cold Blood
talentList.description: When activated, increases the critical strike chance of your next offensive ability by 100%.

talentList.name: Overkill
talentList.description: While stealthed, and for 20 seconds after breaking stealth, you regenerate 30% additional energy.

talentList.name: Seal Fate
talentList.description: Your critical strikes from abilities that add combo points have a v0% chance to add an additional combo point.

talentList.name: Vigor
talentList.description: Increases your maximum Energy by 10.

talentList.name: Vile Poisons
talentList.description: Increases the damage dealt by your poisons and Envenom ability by v0% and gives your damage over time poisons an additional v1% chance to resist dispel effects.

talentList.name: Master Poisoner
talentList.description: Increases the critical hit chance of all attacks made against any target you have poisoned by v0%, reduces the duration of all Poison effects applied to you by v1%, and gives Envenom a v2% chance not to consume Deadly Poison.

talentList.name: Find Weakness
talentList.description: Offensive ability damage increased by v0%.

talentList.name: Mutilate
talentList.description: Instantly attacks with both weapons for 100% weapon damage plus an additional 44 with each weapon.  Damage is increased by 20% against Poisoned targets.  Awards 2 combo points.

talentList.name: Fleet Footed
talentList.description: Reduces the duration of all movement impairing effects by v0% and increases your movement speed by v1%.  This does not stack with other movement speed increasing effects.

talentList.name: Deadened Nerves
talentList.description: Reduces all damage taken by v0%.

talentList.name: Quick Recovery
talentList.description: All healing effects on you are increased by v0%.  In addition, your finishing moves refund v1% of their Energy cost when they fail to hit.

talentList.name: Deadly Brew
talentList.description: When you apply Instant, Wound or Mind-Numbing poison to a target, you have a v0% chance to apply Crippling poison.

talentList.name: Turn the Tables
talentList.description: Whenever anyone in your party or raid blocks, dodges, or parries an attack your chance to critically hit with all combo moves is increased by v0% for 8 sec.

talentList.name: Blood Spatter
talentList.description: Increases the damage caused by your Garrote and Rupture abilities by v0%.

talentList.name: Focused Attacks
talentList.description: Your melee critical strikes have a v0% chance to give you 2 energy.

talentList.name: Cut to the Chase
talentList.description: Your Eviscerate and Envenom abilities have a v0% chance to refresh your Slice and Dice duration to its 5 combo point maximum.

talentList.name: Hunger For Blood
talentList.description: Enrages you, increasing all damage caused by 5%.  Requires a bleed effect to be active on the target.  Lasts 1 min.

talentList.name: Precision
talentList.description: Increases your chance to hit with weapon and poison attacks by v0%.

talentList.name: Close Quarters Combat
talentList.description: Increases your chance to get a critical strike with Daggers and Fist Weapons by v0%.

talentList.name: Mace Specialization
talentList.description: Your attacks with maces ignore up to v0% of your opponent's armor.

talentList.name: Lightning Reflexes
talentList.description: Increases your Dodge chance by v0% and gives you v1% melee haste.

talentList.name: Deflection
talentList.description: Increases your Parry chance by v0%.

talentList.name: Improved Sinister Strike
talentList.description: Reduces the Energy cost of your Sinister Strike ability by v0.

talentList.name: Improved Gouge
talentList.description: Increases the effect duration of your Gouge ability by v0 sec.

talentList.name: Endurance
talentList.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Sprint and Evasion abilities by v0 sec and increases your total Stamina by v1%.

talentList.name: Adrenaline Rush
talentList.description: Increases your Energy regeneration rate by 100% for 15 sec.

talentList.name: Improved Kick
talentList.description: Gives your Kick ability a v0% chance to silence the target for 2 sec.

talentList.name: Dual Wield Specialization
talentList.description: Increases the damage done by your offhand weapon by v0%.

talentList.name: Improved Sprint
talentList.description: Gives a v0% chance to remove all Movement Impairing effects when you activate your Sprint ability.

talentList.name: Blade Flurry
talentList.description: Increases your attack speed by 20%.  In addition, attacks strike an additional nearby opponent.  Lasts 15 sec.

talentList.name: Hack and Slash
talentList.description: Gives you a v0% chance to get an extra attack on the same target after hitting your target with your Sword or Axe.

talentList.name: Riposte
talentList.description: A strike that becomes active after parrying an opponent's attack.  This attack deals 150% weapon damage and slows their melee attack speed by 20% for 30 sec.  Awards 1 combo point.

talentList.name: Aggression
talentList.description: Increases the damage of your Sinister Strike, Backstab, and Eviscerate abilities by v0%.

talentList.name: Weapon Expertise
talentList.description: Increases your expertise by v0.

talentList.name: Vitality
talentList.description: Increases your Energy regeneration rate by v0%.

talentList.name: Blade Twisting
talentList.description: Increases the damage dealt by Sinister Strike and Backstab by v0%, and your damaging melee attacks have a 10% chance to Daze the target for v1 sec.

talentList.name: Nerves of Steel
talentList.description: Reduces damage taken while affected by Stun and Fear effects by v0%.

talentList.name: Surprise Attacks
talentList.description: Your finishing moves can no longer be dodged, and the damage dealt by your Sinister Strike, Backstab, Shiv, Hemorrhage and Gouge abilities is increased by 10%.

talentList.name: Combat Potency
talentList.description: Gives your successful off-hand melee attacks a 20% chance to generate v0 Energy.

talentList.name: Improved Slice and Dice
talentList.description: Increases the duration of your Slice and Dice ability by v0%.

talentList.name: Throwing Specialization
talentList.description: Increases the range of Throw and Deadly Throw by v0 yards and gives your Deadly Throw a v1% chance to interrupt the target for 3 sec.

talentList.name: Unfair Advantage
talentList.description: Whenever you dodge an attack you gain an Unfair Advantage, striking back for v0% of your main hand weapon's damage.  This cannot occur more than once per second.

talentList.name: Savage Combat
talentList.description: Increases your total attack power by v0% and all physical damage caused to enemies you have poisoned is increased by v1%.

talentList.name: Prey on the Weak
talentList.description: Your critical strike damage is increased by v0% when the target has less health than you (as a percentage of total health).

talentList.name: Killing Spree
talentList.description: Step through the shadows from enemy to enemy within 10 yards, attacking an enemy every .5 secs with both weapons until 5 assaults are made, and increasing all damage done by 20% for the duration.  Can hit the same target multiple times.  Cannot hit invisible or stealthed targets.

talentList.name: Master of Deception
talentList.description: Reduces the chance enemies have to detect you while in Stealth mode.

talentList.name: Camouflage
talentList.description: Increases your speed while stealthed by v0% and reduces the cooldown of your Stealth ability by v1 sec.

talentList.name: Initiative
talentList.description: Gives you a v0% chance to add an additional combo point to your target when using your Ambush, Garrote, or Cheap Shot ability.

talentList.name: Setup
talentList.description: Gives you a v0% chance to add a combo point to your target after dodging their attack or fully resisting one of their spells.  This cannot happen more than once per second.

talentList.name: Elusiveness
talentList.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Vanish and Blind abilities by v0 sec and your Cloak of Shadows ability by v1 sec.

talentList.name: Opportunity
talentList.description: Increases the damage dealt with your Backstab, Mutilate, Garrote and Ambush abilities by v0%.

talentList.name: Dirty Tricks
talentList.description: Increases the range of your Blind and Sap abilities by v0 yards and reduces the energy cost of your Blind and Sap abilities by v1%.

talentList.name: Improved Ambush
talentList.description: Increases the critical strike chance of your Ambush ability by v0%.

talentList.name: Dirty Deeds
talentList.description: Reduces the Energy cost of your Cheap Shot and Garrote abilities by v0.  Additionally, your special abilities cause v1% more damage against targets below 35% health.

talentList.name: Preparation
talentList.description: When activated, this ability immediately finishes the cooldown on your Evasion, Sprint, Vanish, Cold Blood and Shadowstep abilities.

talentList.name: Ghostly Strike
talentList.description: A strike that deals 125% weapon damage (180% if a dagger is equipped) and increases your chance to dodge by 15% for 7 sec.  Awards 1 combo point.

talentList.name: Premeditation
talentList.description: When used, adds 2 combo points to your target.  You must add to or use those combo points within 20 sec or the combo points are lost.

talentList.name: Hemorrhage
talentList.description: An instant strike that deals 110% weapon damage (160% if a dagger is equipped) and causes the target to hemorrhage, increasing any Physical damage dealt to the target by up to 13.  Lasts 10 charges or 15 sec.  Awards 1 combo point.

talentList.name: Serrated Blades
talentList.description: Causes your attacks to ignore up to v0% of your target's Armor and increases the damage dealt by your Rupture ability by v1%.

talentList.name: Sleight of Hand
talentList.description: Reduces the chance you are critically hit by melee and ranged attacks by v0% and increases the threat reduction of your Feint ability by v1%.

talentList.name: Heightened Senses
talentList.description: Increases your Stealth detection and reduces the chance you are hit by spells and ranged attacks by v0%.

talentList.name: Deadliness
talentList.description: Increases your attack power by v0%.

talentList.name: Enveloping Shadows
talentList.description: Reduces the damage taken by area of effect attacks by v0%.

talentList.name: Sinister Calling
talentList.description: Increases your total Agility by v0% and increases the percentage damage bonus of Backstab and Hemorrhage by an additional v1%.

talentList.name: Master of Subtlety
talentList.description: Attacks made while stealthed and for 6 seconds after breaking stealth cause an additional v0% damage.

talentList.name: Shadowstep
talentList.description: Attempts to step through the shadows and reappear behind your enemy and increases movement speed by 70% for 3 sec.  The damage of your next ability is increased by 20% and the threat caused is reduced by 50%.  Lasts 10 sec.

talentList.name: Cheat Death
talentList.description: You have a v0% chance that an attack which would otherwise kill you will instead reduce you to 10% of your maximum health. In addition, all damage taken will be reduced by up to 90% for 3 sec (modified by resilience).  This effect cannot occur more than once per minute.

talentList.name: Waylay
talentList.description: Your Ambush and Backstab hits have a v0% chance to unbalance a target, increasing the time between their melee and ranged attacks by 20%, and reducing movement speed by 50% for 8 sec.

talentList.name: Honor Among Thieves
talentList.description: When anyone in your group critically hits with a damage or healing spell or ability, you have a v0% chance to gain a combo point on your current target.  This effect cannot occur more than once every second.

talentList.name: Filthy Tricks
talentList.description: Reduces the cooldown by v0 sec and energy cost by v1 of your Tricks of the Trade, Distract and Shadowstep abilities and reduces the cooldown of Preparation by v2 min.

talentList.name: Slaughter from the Shadows
talentList.description: Reduces the energy cost of your Backstab and Ambush abilities by v0 and the energy cost of your Hemorrhage by vv2, and increases all damage done by 1%.

talentList.name: Shadow Dance
talentList.description: Enter the Shadow Dance for 6 sec, allowing the use of Sap, Garrote, Ambush, Cheap Shot, Premeditation, Pickpocket and Disarm Trap regardless of being stealthed.

talentList.name: Relentless Strikes
talentList.description: Your finishing moves have a v0% chance per combo point to restore 25 energy.

major.name: Glyph of Fan of Knives
major.description: Increases the damage done by Fan of Knives by 20%.

major.name: Glyph of Tricks of the Trade
major.description: The bonus damage and threat redirection granted by your Tricks of the Trade ability lasts an additional 4 sec.

major.name: Glyph of Vigor
major.description: Vigor grants an additional 10 maximum energy.

major.name: Glyph of Cloak of Shadows
major.description: While Cloak of Shadows is active, you take 40% less physical damage.

major.name: Glyph of Deadly Throw
major.description: Increases the slowing effect on Deadly Throw by 20%.

major.name: Glyph of Killing Spree
major.description: Reduces the cooldown on Killing Spree by 45 sec.

major.name: Glyph of Hunger for Blood
major.description: Increases the bonus damage from Hunger For Blood by 3%.

major.name: Glyph of Shadow Dance
major.description: Increases the duration of Shadow Dance by 2 sec.

major.name: Glyph of Mutilate
major.description: Reduces the cost of Mutilate by 5 energy.

major.name: Glyph of Hemorrhage
major.description: Increases the damage bonus against targets afflicted by Hemorrhage by 40%.

major.name: Glyph of Preparation
major.description: Your Preparation ability also instantly resets the cooldown of Blade Flurry, Dismantle, and Kick.

major.name: Glyph of Blade Flurry
major.description: Reduces the energy cost of Blade Flurry by 100%.

major.name: Glyph of Ghostly Strike
major.description: Increases the damage dealt by Ghostly Strike by 40% and the duration of its effect by 4 sec., but increases its cooldown by 10 sec.

major.name: Glyph of Rupture
major.description: Increases the duration of Rupture by 4 sec.

major.name: Glyph of Crippling Poison
major.description: Increases the chance to inflict your target with Crippling Poison by an additional 20%.

major.name: Glyph of Ambush
major.description: Increases the range on Ambush by 5 yards.

major.name: Glyph of Feint
major.description: Reduces the energy cost of Feint by 20.

major.name: Glyph of Garrote
major.description: Reduces the duration of your Garrote ability by 3 sec and increases the total damage it deals by 20%.

major.name: Glyph of Expose Armor
major.description: Increases the duration of Expose Armor by 12 sec.

major.name: Glyph of Slice and Dice
major.description: Increases the duration of Slice and Dice by 3 sec.

major.name: Glyph of Sprint
major.description: Increases the movement speed of your Sprint ability by an additional 30%.

major.name: Glyph of Sap
major.description: Increases the duration of Sap by 20 sec.

major.name: Glyph of Evasion
major.description: Increases the duration of Evasion by 5 sec.

major.name: Glyph of Gouge
major.description: Reduces the energy cost of Gouge by 15.

major.name: Glyph of Backstab
major.description: Your Backstab increases the duration of your Rupture effect on the target by 2 sec, up to a maximum of 6 additional sec.

major.name: Glyph of Sinister Strike
major.description: Your Sinister Strike critical strikes have a 50% chance to add an additional combo point.

major.name: Glyph of Eviscerate
major.description: Increases the critical strike chance of Eviscerate by 10%.

minor.name: Glyph of Safe Fall
minor.description: Increases the distance your Safe Fall ability allows you to fall without taking damage.

minor.name: Glyph of Distract
minor.description: Increases the range of your Distract ability by 5 yards.

minor.name: Glyph of Vanish
minor.description: Increases your movement speed by 30% while the Vanish effect is active.

minor.name: Glyph of Pick Lock
minor.description: Reduces the cast time of your Pick Lock ability by 100%.

minor.name: Glyph of Blurred Speed
minor.description: Enables you to walk on water while your Sprint ability is active.

minor.name: Glyph of Pick Pocket
minor.description: Increases the range of your Pick Pocket ability by 5 yards.
